Container.Name: Face-Blur-Studio
Container.Overview:
Face Blur Studio - Professional AI-powered face censoring tool with browser-based face detection.
Features: - AI-powered face detection using Hugging Face Transformers - Multiple censoring options: black squares, eye bars, pixelation - Real-time preview with full-resolution download - No server-side processing required - all AI runs in browser - Modern dark theme interface
Simply upload an image, select your censoring method, and download the processed result.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the Face Blur Studio web interface
